messages.title: Help Joe Win
messages.content:
Volunteer. Join our team of local volunteers. Sign up online: www.hackneylibdems.org/volunteer

Donate. We are not funded by big business or controlled by trade union bosses. All our money comes from individual supporters. Contribute to the campaign: www.hackneylibdems.org/donate

Join us! Become a Lib Dem member and help decide policy, run campaigns and choose our candidates: www.libdems.org.uk/join

mentions.candidate: Joe co-founded an East London charity that aims to rid the news and politics of unhelpful jargon. Joe will fight for the nearly 80% of Hackney who voted Remain but were let down by Diane Abbott, he will oppose Tory plans for a hard Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Joe will fight for the nearly 80% of Hackney who voted Remain but were let down by Diane Abbott, he will oppose Tory plans for a hard Brexit.

images.caption: Joe Richards for Hackney North & Stoke Newington

examples: Pollsters credit the surge to Lib Dem opposition to Brexit and the terrible performance of Jeremy Corbyn.
Voters have been moving to the Liberal Democrats in large numbers all over the country, switching dozens of council seats.
Joe co-founded an East London charity that aims to rid the news and politics of unhelpful jargon.
Joe will fight for the nearly 80% of Hackney who voted Remain but were let down by Diane Abbott, he will oppose Tory plans for a hard Brexit.
Pollsters credit the surge to Lib Dem opposition to Brexit and the terrible performance of Jeremy Corbyn.
